title: Reconnect with Your Deeper  Self: The Embodied Present Process Explained
content: Shaking up the way we look at our self and the world, our guest Philip Shepherd documents how our culture systematically desensitizes our ability to sense the whole in his new book 'Radical Wholeness.'   Philip shares with us how each of us is whole, yet we are taught life works differently. In this episode, he lays out a simple, practical way of undoing the divisions and compartmentalizations within us.  You will:  • Discover the profound healing intelligence of our body,  • Uncover how to undo desensitization and return to living an experience of wholeness,  • Unwrap how to find your way out of your head and reunite with your body’s intelligence,   • Find ways to ground yourself in a wholeness-of-being that feels and supports the healing harmonies of life,  plus much more....   Philip Shepherd is recognized as an international authority on 'embodiment.' He travels the world
contentWithMarkup:
Shaking up the way we look at our self and the world, our guest Philip Shepherd documents how our culture systematically desensitizes our ability to sense the whole in his new book 'Radical Wholeness.' 

Philip shares with us how each of us is whole, yet we are taught life works differently. In this episode, he lays out a simple, practical way of undoing the divisions and compartmentalizations within us.  You will:

• Discover the profound healing intelligence of our body,

• Uncover how to undo desensitization and return to living an experience of wholeness,

• Unwrap how to find your way out of your head and reunite with your body’s intelligence, 

• Find ways to ground yourself in a wholeness-of-being that feels and supports the healing harmonies of life,  plus much more....


Philip Shepherd is recognized as an international authority on 'embodiment.' He travels the world
